name: StartStockReservation2
description:
Starts a user task of type Stock Reservation.

- The task will return all required data for display purposes
- When no lines are returned, the task is already completed or in progress by someone else
- To complete the StockReservation task, use the `CompleteStockReservationTask` service
auth_description: Requires a user of type `Employee` or `Api`

headers.name: EVA-User-Agent
headers.description: The user agent that is making these calls. Don't make this specific per device/browser but per application. This should be of the form: `MyFirstUserAgent/1.0.0`

headers.name: EVA-Requested-OrganizationUnitID
headers.description: The ID of the organization unit to run this request in.

headers.name: EVA-Requested-OrganizationUnit-Query
headers.description: The query that selects the organization unit to run this request in.

B.name: Force
B.description: Force a restart of the task, even when it's already started by a different user.

B.name: UserTaskID
B.description: This is the ID of a `UserTask`

D.name: Code
D.description: A unique ID identifying this error.

D.name: Message
D.description: A human-readable message describing the error.

D.name: RequestID
D.description: A unique ID identifying the request. Please provide this ID when contacting support.

D.name: Type
D.description: A short description of the error type.

E.name: ChildLines
E.description: The child lines for this line

E.name: OrderLineID
E.description: This is the ID of a `OrderLine`

E.name: ParentID
E.description: This is the ID of a `OrderLine`

E.name: ProductBundleLineID
E.description: This is the ID of a `ProductBundleLine`

E.name: ProductID
E.description: This is the ID of a `Product`

E.name: QuantityOnHand
E.description: Current stock of this product in the pickuporganizationunit

E.name: Requirements
E.description: This is the ID of a `OrderLine`

E.name: SerialNumberConfigurationID
E.description: This is the ID of a `SerialNumberConfiguration`

F.name: ExternalIDs
F.description: When using the `ExternalIDs` mode, this will hold the resolved external IDs.

F.name: IsAsyncResultAvailable
F.description: This is a flag indicating whether the async request is done. If it is `null`, it is not an async service. If it is `false`, the response is not yet available. Do not process the properties in that case. It is is `true` the properties are filled with the result of the call.

F.name: UnresolvedExternalIDs
F.description: When using the `ExternalIDs` mode, this will hold the external IDs we couldn't resolve.

C.name: OrderID
C.description: This is the ID of a `Order`

C.name: UserTaskID
C.description: This is the ID of a `UserTask`
